data.comment: Huddersfield kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Goal! Huddersfield have got their heads in front thanks to a Fraizer Campbell strike.
In the minute 21, Ryan Schofield (Huddersfield) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Vladan Ivic (Watford) is making a first substitution, with Francisco Sierralta replacing William Troost-Ekong.
Own goal! Etienne Capoue scores in his own net to make it 2-0.
In the minute 34, Ben Wilmot is booked for the away team.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway. Watford with the kick-off.
In the minute 63, Huddersfield make their first substitution with Alex Pritchard replacing Carel Eiting.
Vladan Ivic is making the team's second substitution at John Smith's Stadium with Stipe Perica replacing Etienne Capoue.
Marc Navarro is on a sub for Jeremy Ngakia for Watford.
In the minute 77, Adam Masina is replacing Ben Wilmot for Watford at John Smith's Stadium.
Aaron Rowe is replacing Isaac Mbenza for the home team.
At John Smith's Stadium, Juninho Bacuna has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
The home team have replaced Juninho Bacuna with Adama Diakhaby. This is the third substitution made today by Carlos Corberan.
